column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat|salience|identity
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent

#Summary1=(human1) Siri tells about an incident from his childhood, when, after recovering from brain surgery to treat epilepsy, he saved his friend Pag from bullies hitting him by brutally beating three of them with a rock.

#Summary2=(claude-3-5-sonnet-20241022) A young boy who had half his brain removed to treat epilepsy violently defends his only friend from bullies, leading his friend to claim he's no longer the same person since the surgery.

#Summary3=(gpt4o) A young boy named Siri, altered by brain surgery to manage his epilepsy, recounts a pivotal moment from his childhood when he instinctively defended his best friend Robert “Pag” Paglino from bullies, showcasing his struggles with empathy and identity as his friend accuses him of being changed or replaced by the procedure.

#Summary4=(Llama-3.2-3B-Instruct) The narrator recalls the day his best friend, Robert Paglino, was attacked by a group of older kids at the playground, and he, the narrator, intervened to defend him, but in doing so, he reveals a new aspect of himself that he didn't know existed.

#Summary5=(Qwen2.5-7B-Instruct) The narrator, reflecting on a pivotal moment from childhood, recounts helping his genetically modified friend Robert “Pag” defend himself against bullies, which leads to the narrator's own transformation after the incident.
#Text=Prologue
#Text=" Try to touch the past .
#Text=Three decades it took , to see the irony in that remark .
#Text=Two of the enemy twitched at my feet .
#Text=I kicked one in the head until it stopped moving , turned to the other .
#Text=Something grabbed my arm and I swung without thinking , without looking until Pag yelped and ducked out of reach .
#Text=" Oh , " I said .
#Text=" Sorry . "
#Text=One thing lay motionless .
#Text=The other moaned and held its head and curled up in a ball .
#Text=" Oh shit , " Pag panted .
#Text=Blood coursed unheeded from his nose and splattered down his shirt .
#Text=His cheek was turning blue and yellow .
#Text=" Oh shit oh shit oh shit ... "
#Text=I thought of something to say .
#Text=" You all right ? "
#Text=" Oh shit , you — I mean , you never ... "
#Text=He wiped his mouth .
#Text=Blood smeared the back of his hand .
#Text=" Oh man are we in trouble . "
#Text=" They started it . "
#Text=" Yeah , but you — I mean , look at them ! "
#Text=The moaning thing was crawling away on all fours .
#Text=I wondered how long it would be before it found reinforcements .
#Text=I wondered if I should kill it before then .
#Text=" You 'd a never done that before , " Pag said .
#Text=Before the operation , he meant .
#Text=I actually did feel something then — faint , distant , but unmistakable .
#Text=I felt angry .
#Text=" They started — "
#Text=Pag backed away , eyes wide .
#Text=" What are you doing ?
#Text=I did n't understand why he could n't see that .
#Text=" You 're , you 're not the same , " Pag said from a safe distance .
#Text=" You 're not even Siri any more . "
#Text=" I am too .
#Text=" Only half .

column3:
_	_	_	_	_	_	

#Text= My mom and dad , " I said , suddenly quiet , " saved my life .

_	_	_	_	_	_	

#Text= I think you did die , " said my best and only friend .

column1: #Text=" I think Siri died , they scooped him out and threw him away and you 're some whole other kid that just , just grew back out of what was left .
